dt: {bc}having corresponding points whose connecting lines are bisected by a given point or perpendicularly bisected by a given line or plane
{bc}being such that the terms or variables may be interchanged without altering the value, character, or truth

dt.t: R is a {it}symmetric{/it} relation if {it}a{/it}R{it}b{/it} implies {it}b{/it}R{it}a{/it}

dt: {bc}capable of division by a longitudinal plane into similar halves
{bc}having the same number of members in each whorl of floral leaves
{bc}being a derivative with groups substituted {a_link|symmetrically} in the molecule

dt: {bc}the condition of having similar parts regularly arranged around a central axis
